title: Prepare Your Kids for Spiritual Battles
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Shauna Pilgreen
itunes:summary:
The Christian life is not free from hardship. John and Danny describe how to talk to your kids about difficult circumstances.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Shauna Pilgreen's book "Love Where You Live" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-03-16?refcd=1068302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/prepare-your-kids-for-spiritual-battles/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
